intro.description: We are a social skate project.

Lil Gnars 2.achievements: Second Day of our amazing event with the new generation of pure Brazilian skateboarding, we had fun and love!

Lil Gnars 3.achievements: The final day of Lil Gnars was pure fun and smiling face at our barbecue, at the sunset we give the Lil Gnars Brand new boards for the kids! The vibe was undiscraribel.
